abstract: New York City Police Department drops sex crimes charges against Joshua Flecha, one of two men charged in series of sexual attacks in Brooklyn, after victim recants her identification of him.
snippet: The woman, who says she was attacked in Park Slope, Brooklyn, had picked the suspect out of a police lineup, but other victims did not identify him as the culprit.
lead_paragraph: The woman, who says she was attacked in Park Slope, Brooklyn, had picked the suspect out of a police lineup, but other victims did not identify him as the culprit.

headline.main: Sex Charges Dropped After Victim Recants Identification
headline.print_headline: Sex Crime Charges Are Dropped After Victim Recants Identification
